Title: The Two Mrs. Scottsons
Plot: Celia and Sullivan step up their relationship. Andy gets more involved in a different business. Silas and Tara begin working together. Shane and Isabelle spend time together. Nancy meets Peter's other ex-wife, Valerie.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Brooke Smith, Daryl Sabara, Jack Stehlin
